definition: a point or extent in space
details:
noun
- a point or extent in space
- a determination of the place where something is
= synonyms: localization, localisation, locating, fix
- the act of putting something in a certain place
= synonyms: placement
- a workplace away from a studio at which some or all of a movie may be made
= example: a workplace away from a studio at which some or all of a movie may be made
